[Quick Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=3923) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Kingdom" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=438" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 532</row>

**Prerequisites**
Stability 14

</column>

---

Your kingdom recovers more quickly from danger and disaster. Whenever you attempt a skill check to end an ongoing harmful kingdom event, you gain a +4 status bonus to the check.
